page.title: 13FAMILY LIFE CONTINUED.
page.content:
John went out for a meal. Then mum was in the Castle cary skittles week final to see if she could win the ladies Â£25 prize. They came home at 11.00.and went to bed.Oh, Racheal cooked me egg and chips for supper. Then I stayed up and watched T.V. till 10.00.
{"I remember when my teacher tied a {piece of cotton to my friend's tooth {and tied the other end to the door. {She slammed the door and "Crack" out {came the tooth and it hit the door." { { } {"My favourite subject is playtime."} {
